entry.title: Five Amazing Benefits of User Onboarding You Should Know
entry.summary: User onboarding is the most significant part of the digital user experience. If designed carefully, it can eventually result in the user who is becoming your brand's regular user.

entry.title: 5 Tips for More Engaging Product Tours
entry.summary: Product tours play a significant role in user onboarding. The goal of product tours is to make people fall in love with your product or feature. You guide them through this process persuade them to take action.
